item.title: Aspose.Slides for Reporting Services 5.5.0 Release Notes
item.description: Key Summary Category SLIDESREP-33474 Support for SQL Server 2016 in Aspose.Slides New Feature SLIDESREP-33509 Aspose.Slides.Reporting Services license not working with 5.4.0 Bug There are no API changes in this release.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Reporting Services 5.4.0 Release Notes
item.description: Key Summary Category SLIDESREP-33507 Some cell borders are placed in wrong position Bug SLIDESREP-33506 Long text in a table is missing in generated presentation Bug SLIDESREP-33500 Default font size is 1 in table cell of generated presentation Bug There are no API changes in this release.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Reporting Services 5.3.1 Release Notes
item.description: Key Summary Category SLIDESREP-33498 User who has installed the setup file can only able to see the setup version details Bug SLIDESREP-33501 TextBox is overlapped by Table Bug There are no API changes in this release.

item.title: Aspose.Slides for Reporting Services 5.3.0 Release Notes
item.description: Key Summary Category SLIDESREP-33493 Error on Export to PPT:An error occurred during local report processing. All row’s heights must be greater than zero Bug SLIDESREP-33491 Issue while installing Aspose.Slides in sharepoint integrated environment Bug SLIDESREP-33490 Incorrect images rendering to PowerPoint Bug SLIDESREP-33489 Tablix object names are not set for table names in generated presentation Bug SLIDESREP-33488 Text overflow in generated presentation Bug SLIDESREP-33487 Images are not rendered properly Bug SLIDESREP-33479 High Memory Usage on PPTX Export Bug There are no API changes in this release.
